text: The Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne University is a French university located in Paris founded in 1971.Panthéon-Sorbonne University – Paris 1 The university provides courses in Economics, Law, Philosophy, Sociology, History, Geography, Cinema, Plastic arts, Art history, Political science, Development Studies, Mathematics and Management. Ranked in the top 20 of the best art and humanities universities in the world in the highly reputable QS World University Rankings in 2024, it is also one of the best universities in the country.Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne == Famous former students == * Abdoul Mbaye, a Senegalese politician * Philippe Harache, a French aerospace engineer and businessman ==References== ==Other websites== * Paris 1 Panthéon- Sorbonne University, official web site Category:1971 establishments in France Category:Universities in Paris
title: Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne University
